dr.evolution.coalescent
Class CoalescentSimulator

java.lang.Object
  dr.evolution.coalescent.CoalescentSimulator

public class CoalescentSimulator
extends java.lang.Object

This class provides the basic engine for coalescent simulation of a given demographic model over a given time period. The input is a set of nodes (some of which may be subtrees) and the output is a new (smaller) set of nodes after some coalescence over a certain time period. $Id: CoalescentSimulator.java,v 1.9 2005/05/24 20:25:55 rambaut Exp $

Author:
Alexei Drummond

coalesceTwoActiveNodes

private void coalesceTwoActiveNodes(double height)
Coalesce two nodes in the active list. This method removes the two (randomly selected) active nodes and replaces them with the new node at the top of the active list.
